beats: I set aside 12 gleaming jars of plum chutney and take that dozen as my starting number.
Then I add 7 more jars I sterilised after supper, because backups matter.
Next I multiply the tally by 2 so every jar gets a label on its front and back.
I gift 5 jars to the neighbours across the landing and subtract them from my stash.
Finally, I stir in 60 minutes of simmering pride and add that to my running total.
maths.question: Tell me straight â€” what number am I admiring? ___
